heroSection.customHTML:
Welcome to Brews & Beans

Sip into serenity with every cup.

customSections.html:
About Us

At Brews & Beans, we believe coffee is more than just a beverage; it's an experience. Our carefully curated menu features locally-sourced, organic coffee beans roasted to perfection. Join us for a cozy atmosphere, delicious pastries, and memorable moments!

services.title: Coffee & Beverages
services.description: A variety of handcrafted coffee drinks, teas, and smoothies made with the finest ingredients.

services.title: Pastry & Snacks
services.description: Indulge in our selection of fresh pastries, croissants, and healthy snacks, perfect to pair with your drink.

services.title: Catering Services
services.description: Let us bring the coffee experience to your special events with our tailored catering services.

testimonials.name: Emma Johnson
testimonials.message: Brews & Beans is my go-to spot for a morning pick-me-up! The atmosphere is so inviting and the coffee is simply unbeatable.

testimonials.name: Michael Adams
testimonials.message: I've tried many coffee shops, but none match the quality and warmth that Brews & Beans offers. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Sophia Lopez
testimonials.message: Their pastries are to die for and their baristas are super friendly. A wonderful place to relax.

contact.contactFormHTML: <form class='mt-6'><input type='text' placeholder='Your Name' class='w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-4' /><input type='email' placeholder='Your Email' class='w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-4' /><textarea placeholder='Your Message' class='w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-4' rows='4'></textarea><button type='submit' class='bg-primary text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded'>Send Message</button></form>
